metadata.title: CVE-2024-46831 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: microchip: vcap: Fix use-after-free error in kunit testThis is a clear use-after-free error. We remove it, and rely on checkingthe return code of vcap_del_rule.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
